comment_info: Configuration for Lighter-Aster Delta Neutral Hedge Bot
comment_symbols: List of symbols to monitor (without USDT suffix)
comment_notional: Position size in USD per trade
comment_hold_duration: How long to hold each position in hours (8h = 1 full Lighter funding cycle)
comment_wait: Minutes to wait between position cycles
comment_check_interval: Seconds between position health checks while holding
comment_min_apr: Minimum net APR threshold to open positions (in percentage)
comment_stop_loss: Enable automatic stop-loss based on leverage
comment_health_monitoring: Enable health monitoring during hold period
